name: Energized
description:
A stimulating blend of Citrus, including Grapefruit, Lemon and Lime, with hints of fresh Cucumber and Jasmine, and a touch of Pineapple, Blackberry and Champagne.

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants. 

Each generous bar weighs a minimum of 6 oz.

name: Soap Cake Slices
description:
Choose either Chocolate Peppermint or Berry Shortcake for your fragrance selection.

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants  

Each cake slice weighs a minimum of 5.5 oz.

name: Yuzu Handmade Soap
description:
Based on the Japanese fruit of the same name, Yuzu is a fresh and sparkling citrus. 

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 6 oz.

name: White Tea & Ginger
description:
A delightful spa-like fragrance with top notes of Bergamot, Lemon Peels and Green Daylilies and brought back to its roots with a base of Ginger, Nutmeg and Warm Musk. White floral notes, such as Hyacinth, Freesia and Peony complete the mix. This fragrance is unique in many ways and it is difficult to pick out individual notes when you smell the soothing blend.

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorant
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 6 oz.

name: Viva La Juicy Handmade Soap
description:
Golden amber and Egyptian musk intermingled with sparkling citrus, lily of the valley, pink jasmine and warm woods.
 
Ingredients: Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 6 oz.

name: Cedar and Saffron
description:
Fragrant cedar is infused with the sensual smoky scents of patchouli, sandalwood and vetiver, then topped with Eastern spices and a trace of white musk. 

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants. 

Each bar weighs a minimum of 5.5 oz.

name: Celtic Myst Handmade Soap
description:
This fragrance has a warm blend of precious woods, spices and resins then enchanced with a splash of mandarin, musk and cashmere vanilla.
 
Ingredients: Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin clay, Cosmetic Colorants 
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 6 oz.

name: Spiced Mahogany
description:
This sophisticated men's fragrance is deep and rich with notes of Italian Bergamot, Apple Wood and Tonka Bean to round out the darker, more sensuous Patchouli, Cedarwood, and Oakmoss and finish with undertones of cardamom, vanilla bourbon and allspice. 

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants. 

Each bar weighs a minimum of 5.5 oz.

name: Celestial Sea Handmade Soap
description:
This bold water fragrance opens with a salty, ozonic sea spray but what develops is an ocean musk built from sea moss, driftwood and sand. Hidden are crisp notes of soft violet, jasmine and lily rose that give the otherwise stout fragrance a delicate clean character.


Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 6 oz.

name: Bonsai
description:
A floral fresh zen type of fragrance with citrus and pine accords, having some tropical fruits and wood tones in the background. 

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants. 

Each bar weighs a minimum of 6.5 oz.

name: Love Spell Handmade Soap
description:
An absolutely tantalizing fragrance composed of sweet bouquet of mandarin orange, bergamot, and tangerine enhanced by hints of fresh peaches, strawberries, and raspberries on an undertone of white musk.
 
Ingredients:  Distilled Water, Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 6 oz.

name: Boudoir Handmade Soap
description:
Complex fragrance with many layers that include jasmine, angelica, carnation, musk, woods and amber.  It's clean with hints of spice. 


Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants 
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 5.7 oz.

name: Raspberry Patchouli Handmade Soap
description:
A fruity blend of blackberry, peach, raspberry & strawberry notes with a violet and rosewood middle note lying on a bed of woody patchouli leaves.

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 6 oz.

name: Oatmeal, Milk & Honey Handmade Soap
description:
The perfect melding of three fabulous scents. Sweet and toasty, this is one soap that you'll want to take a bite out of!

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorant
 
Each bar weighs a minimum of 5.5 oz.

name: Cherry Almond
description:
Delicous blend of ripe cherries and almonds.  

Ingredients:  Saponified Oils of Sustainable Organic Palm, Coconut, Olive, Castor, Cocoa Butter, Palm Kernel, Distilled Water, Cream, Fragrance, Sodium Lactate, Kaolin Clay, Cosmetic Colorants. 

Each bar weighs a minimum of 5.5 oz.

name: All-Natural Lip Balms
description:
Comes in 7 Flavors: Butter Toffee, Creme de Menthe, French Pear, Orange Creamsicle, Pink Lemonade, Sangria and Spryte. **As of 12/21, we are sold out of Creme de Menthe and French Pear.  

Ingredients:  Coconut Oil, Bees Wax, Organic Shea Butter, Organic Cocoa Butter, Vitamin E, Stevia

Net weight:  .15 oz
